title: Mathieu van der Poel Swoops to 152nd Career Win in First Clash of ‘Big 3’
content:
Dutchman proves fastest again, with Van Aert and Iserbyt best of the rest, Pidcock hit by bad luck in Antwerp CX: 'I didn’t panic and took my time.'

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel Swoops to 152nd Career Win in First Clash of ‘Big 3’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
